content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary Smith, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. Can you please give me an offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Interesting! Let me think about your offer. I am hoping for a higher price than that, but I am open to discussing the terms and conditions with you. Would you be willing to sign a one-year lease?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I would be willing to sign a one-year lease.

What are the terms and conditions of the lease?

Do you accept credit cards or other forms of payment?

What are the move-in and move-out dates?

Do you have any other questions for me?

Thank you for your time, Mister Heine.

TERMINATE
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Thank you for your offer, Mary Smith. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. However, I am not willing to accept your offer of 500 Euros per month. I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my gains.

Regarding the terms and conditions of the lease, I am willing to discuss those with you. Would you be open to discussing a two-year lease instead of a one-year lease?

As for payment, I do accept credit cards.

The move-in date is flexible, but I am looking for a move-in date within the next two months. The move-out date would be the end of the lease term, which would be either June 30th or December 31st, depending on the lease term.

Do you have any other questions for me? Thank you for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
